projects.title: Monitoring Plants with Sensors
projects.description: An IoT personal project I'm working on which connects sensors, like temperature, luminosity, moisture, etc. to Internet where data is collected to be displayed on client web apps and/or hybrid apps.
projects.stack:
Arduino, Raspberry Pi
Node.js/Express, PostgreSQL
Ember.js, D3.js
Phonegap, Ionic

projects.title: Street Fighter in CSS
projects.description:
A simple demo of a powerful feature in CSS with which you can create a retro 2D game like Street Fighter (with a little bit of JS though). It has been featured on [the David Walsh blog](https://davidwalsh.name/street-fighter) and on Codepen's home page for a few weeks.

The little project recorded more than 40k views in only 24 hours.

projects.title: CSS 3D Icosahedron
projects.description:
A another demo this time showcasing some complex CSS 3D transforms to create a nice icosahedron. 
Absolutely no JS were used.

projects.title: AXA Tech - Cloud Portal
projects.description: For AXA Technology Services, I was in charge of the whole user interface design and of all the screens development with JavaScript. The product was a multi-cloud management plateform (PaaS and IaaS services).

projects.title: An In-Depth Introduction To Ember.js
projects.description: I wrote this extensive step-by-step tutorial for Smashing Magazine on Ember.js, the amazing JavaScript framework.

projects.title: MyTripSet - Desktop Version
projects.description: I helped the designers to create the UI and implemented most of the screens of this responsive web application for Voyages-SNCF.com, which was awarded by an [Observeur du design price](http://www.apci.asso.fr/realisation/404) in 2013.

projects.title: MyTripSet - Mobile Version
projects.description: Here, for the mobile responsive version I also implemented most of the the screens for the MyTripSet project (see above).

projects.title: La Carte des Bons Plans
projects.description: On this project I helped the designers to create the designs and implemented all the UI of this JavaScript geolocation application for Voyages-SNCF.com.
